This is a duplicate. Moving to PDE.

I've got it in a worst flavour. Created a new launcher based on
Runtime Workbench and changed the application name. Now I can only
run the application once per Eclipse session and then get the same
message and log as above. Have to restart everytime in order to
run again.

I'm using build 20020412 on Mandrake Linux 8.2 - KDE 2.2.2 .

Are you sure your application ever returns? I am only listening to debug 
events, which means that I wasn't notified that your application has 
terminated. Do you see all the processes terminated in the debug tree view?

It does not matter if the application returned becazse I killed the app (i.e.
terminate and remove) and the debug window was empty (no process). After
restarting Eclipse it worked again (for some time).
As far as I remember there were no processes shown by the debugger.

PDE has removed all checks for running instance. As of the next build, you are 
on your own :-).
